text: The 1976 LPGA Championship was the 22nd LPGA Championship, held May 27–30 at Pine Ridge Golf Course in Lutherville, Maryland, a suburb north of Baltimore. Betty Burfeindt won her only major title, a stroke ahead of runner-up Judy Rankin.
